vlive.korean: 또 한 명씩 말했던 색깔은 다양한 색... And the colors that each person said... It was a variety. 듣기 View video VICTON : 잘자요 우리 앨리스💙💛
vlive.english: And the colors that each person said... It was a variety.

vlive.korean: 한이랑 리노 형 많이 보는 거 - 리노 형이 말했던 거? It's the drama that HAN and LEE KNOW watch. - The one LEE KNOW talked about? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
vlive.english: It's the drama that HAN and LEE KNOW watch. - The one LEE KNOW talked about?

vlive.korean: 그렇죠, 뭐 - 좋습니다 그러면 아까 재범 씨를 말했던 분은 누구였어요? All right. - Good. - Who said JB? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] GOT7 SHOWCASE
vlive.english: All right. - Good. - Who said JB?

vlive.korean: 이거 그거 말하는 거 아니에요? 소셜 차트 37등인가 그때 말했던 거? Aren't you talking about that? That we got ranked the social chart's 37th place? 듣기 View video VICTON : 레몬2🐥🐶🍋
vlive.english: Aren't you talking about that? That we got ranked the social chart's 37th place?

vlive.korean: [1분의 연습 시간을 준다고 말했던 제작진] - 1분이라고 - 아니에요 1분 동안이에요 - 1분이야? [Staff told they're given 1 minute to practice] - They're giving us 1 minute. - Oh, 1 minute? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.93
vlive.english: [Staff told they're given 1 minute to practice] - They're giving us 1 minute. - Oh, 1 minute?

examples.korean: He said he’ll be coming tomorrow. At any rate, I think that’s what he said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 내일 온다고 했어. 적어도, 내 생각에는 그가 그렇게 말했던 것 같애. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He said he’ll be coming tomorrow. At any rate, I think that’s what he said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was obvious from what he said that he had been badly treated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 말했던 것으로부터 그가 나쁘게 대우 받아 왔다는 것이 명백했다. 절대어휘 5100

examples.korean: I would say to the House, as I said to those who have joined this Government: 'I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears, and sweat." (Sir Winston Churchill) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 정부에 참여한 장관들에게 말했던 대로 의회 여러분들에게 다시 말합니다. 저는 피, 수고, 눈물, 땀밖에 드릴 것이 없습니다. (윈스턴 처칠, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I would say to the House, as I said to those who have joined this Government: 'I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears, and sweat." (Sir Winston Churchill) Add to Wordbook
